shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes subscribing to the video streams of all remote users.

p.codeblock: public abstract int muteAllRemoteVideoStreamsEx(boolean muted, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int muteAllRemoteVideoStreamsEx(bool mute, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|RtcEngineProxy") int MuteAllRemoteVideoStreamsEx(bool mute, const FRtcConnection& connection);
public abstract int MuteAllRemoteVideoStreamsEx(bool mute, RtcConnection connection);
Future<void> muteAllRemoteVideoStreamsEx( {required bool mute, required RtcConnection connection});

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.props: native unreal bp unity rn electron cs
ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
